ARABIC: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ ٱلْأُمُورُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Everything in the heavens and everything in the earth belongs to Allah. All matters return to Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For to God belongs all that is in the heavens and the earth, and to God do all things return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: To Allah belongs all that is in the heavens and the earth, and to Allah are all matters referred for decision.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: To God belongs all that is in the heavens and the earth and to Him do all things return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And to Allah only belongs all whatever is in the heavens and all whatever is in the earth; and towards Allah only is the return of all matters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And to Allah belongs all that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth. And all matters go back (for decision) to Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth is Allah's; and to Allah all things return
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: To God belongs all that is in the heavens and in the earth, and unto Him all matters are returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Unto Allah belongeth whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth; and unto Allah all things are returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: His is all that the heavens and the earth contain. To God shall all things return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah's is whatsoever is in the heavens and in the earth; and unto Allah shall be committed all affairs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: To Allah belongs whatever there is in the heavens and the earth, and to Allah all matters are returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: To Allah belongs all that is in the heavens and on earth: To Him do all questions go back (for decision).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And to Allah belongs all that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth. And all matters go back (for decision) to Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: To Allah belongs all that is in the heavens and the earth. To Him all matters shall return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: To God belongs everything in the heavens and everything on earth, and to God all events are referred.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: To Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And to Allah will [all] matters be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:109] To God belongs all that is in the heavens and in the earth, as possessions, creatures and servants, and to Him all matters are returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Unto Allah belongeth whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth) of created beings and marvellous things; (and unto Allah all things are returned) in the Hereafter. 67
